text: What is the name of your favorite zoo?
Where is this zoo located (city and country)?
What is your favorite animal or exhibit at this zoo?
When was the last time you visited this zoo?
What makes this zoo special compared to others you've visited?
Is there a specific memory or experience from this zoo that stands out?
How would you rate the zoo's conservation efforts (if you know about them)?
What amenities did you appreciate at this zoo (food options, rest areas, etc.)?
Would you recommend this zoo to others?
Is there anything you think could be improved about this zoo?
